title: Bought 2 Rune Pages and did not get them
body: I bought 2 rune pages for the price of 1 and did not receive the rune pages yet my ip was still removed from my account.

replies.body:
Hi Deadskeezz,

In this case could I please get you to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to have support look into it? We're not getting any other reports of this happening and it would be helpful to have support into your account in detail to figure out what is going on.

I d/c'd and it have me 5 lower priority que's and they have a 20 min LeaverBuster limit, i dc'd for 2 mins and rejoin.. lift my leaver buster ban instantly it wasn't my fault, and riot really needs to fix this issue its pointless and annoying. im expecting within 10 mins this will be gone. thank you.
They don't remove low priority queues, well i'm pretty sure they don't.
